name: WpApper – Create native mobile apps(Android and iOS)
author: WpApper

sections.description:
CREATE NATIVE MOBILE APPS FOR YOUR WORDPRESS WEBSITES(Android and iOS)
No Coding Required

More info at http://wpapper.com

Feature

  • No Coding Required
    There is no need to be a developer or designer to create your app.

  • Seamless Integration
    WpApper seamlessly integrate with your existing website and fetch content automatically.

  • Offline

  • Push Notification

  • Comments

  • Native app

  • Free update app

Demo App

WpApper Demo

Version 1.0.3

  • fix bug

Version 1.0.1

  • Add push notification msg

Version 1.0.0 (12-06-2017)

  • NEW: Initial Release

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
WordPress Admin

  1. Search ‘wpapper’ plugin
  2. Install and activate the plugin
  3. Find the page through: Settings -> Wpapper

Or ftp method

  1. Open wp-content/plugins Folder
  2. Put: Folder: wpapper
  3. Activate wpapper Plugin
  4. Go to WP-Admin -> Settings -> WpApper to configure the plugin.
  5. Go to http://wpapper.com/ submit web info

For detailed instructions http://wpapper.com/

Usage
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

WordPress Admin

  1. Search ‘wpapper’ plugin
  2. Install and activate the plugin
  3. Find the page through: Settings -> Wpapper
Or ftp method
  1. Open wp-content/plugins Folder
  2. Put: Folder: wpapper
  3. Activate wpapper Plugin
  4. Go to WP-Admin -> Settings -> WpApper to configure the plugin.
  5. Go to http://wpapper.com/ submit web info

For detailed instructions http://wpapper.com/

Usage
